summary.span: 为所有站点地图数据提供程序提供公共基类，并为开发人员提供一条实现自定义站点地图数据提供程序的途径，这些提供程序可与 ASP.NET 站点地图基础结构一起用作 对象的持久存储区。

span.span: Provides a common base class for all site map data providers, and a way for developers to implement custom site map data providers that can be used with the ASP.NET site map infrastructure as persistent stores for objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 并类表示抽象的默认实现类。The and classes represent the default implementations of the abstract class. 使用名为 Web.sitemap XML 文件来存储站点地图数据。The uses an XML file named Web.sitemap to store site map data. 在下的 Web.sitemap 文件有关的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 站点地图](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6b85a558-1df8-44cf-bea6-62e61bcc8d20)。For more information on about the Web.sitemap file, see [ASP.NET Site Maps](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6b85a558-1df8-44cf-bea6-62e61bcc8d20). 类支持的站点映射提供程序层次结构概念，通过声明和属性。The class supports the concept of a site map provider hierarchy, by declaring the and properties. 一个可以是子级或父级另一个提供程序。A can be a child or parent of another provider. 这样可以拥有或由不同的开发组维护其自己的站点映射和站点地图提供程序的实现不同的站点的内容区域的位置。This enables scenarios where different content areas of a site are owned or implemented by different development groups that maintain their own site maps and site map providers. 所有在 Web.config 文件中配置对象。All objects are configured in the Web.config files. 在这些配置文件中声明任何站点映射提供程序是在运行时，用于加载和处理站点导航数据。Any site map providers that are declared in these configuration files are loaded at run time and are used to load and process site navigation data. 对象，它跟踪的所有提供程序可供通过其属性集合，提供对由提供程序将导航数据编程访问。The object, which keeps track of all the providers that are available to it through its property collection, provides programmatic access to the navigation data that is managed by the providers. 下面的代码示例演示用于声明一个 Web.config 文件中的站点映射提供程序的格式。The following code example demonstrates the format that is used to declare a site map provider in a Web.config file. ``` ``` 站点导航数据加载的这些提供程序由其他组件的站点映射基础结构，如和控件，以显示用户的站点映射信息。The site navigation data that is loaded by these providers is used by other components of the site map infrastructure, such as the and controls, to display site map information for users. 如果您实现您自己的站点地图提供程序，你可以在 ASP.NET 应用程序的 App_Code 目录中放置源文件，然后将自动编译该程序集。If you implement your own site map provider, you can place the source file in the App_Code directory of your ASP.NET application, and then the assembly will be compiled automatically. 您还可以将你自己的站点地图提供程序放在全局程序集缓存 (GAC)，并提供对它的 Web.config 文件中的完全限定引用。You can also place your own site map provider in the Global Assembly Cache (GAC), and provide a fully-qualified reference to it in the Web.config file. 编译器服务的详细信息，请参阅[使用程序集和全局程序集缓存](~/docs/framework/app-domains/working-with-assemblies-and-the-gac.md)。For more information on compiler services, see [Working with Assemblies and the Global Assembly Cache](~/docs/framework/app-domains/working-with-assemblies-and-the-gac.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何编写一个实现抽象类类。The following code example demonstrates how to write a class that implements the abstract class. 此示例包括示例仅以及适用于它的示例文本文件。This example includes only a sample and a sample text file that works with it. 若要运行该示例还需要在 Web.config 文件和.aspx 页面中的条目。To run the example you also need an entry in the Web.config file and an .aspx page. 您可以找到这些文档中属性。You can find these in the documentation for the property. 该示例使用遵循预期的结构来加载站点地图信息以逗号分隔的文件。The example uses a comma-delimited file that follows an expected structure to load sitemap information. 该文件的第一行表示站点地图的根节点和后续行是子节点。The first line of the file represents the root node of the sitemap, and subsequent lines are subnodes. 每个子节点标识其父节点的 URL。Each subnode identifies its parent node by URL. 满足这些条件的文件的示例如下所示。An example of a file that meets these criteria is shown below. ``` default.aspx,Home,MyCompany Home Page, sale.aspx,Now On Sale,Check Out These Great Deals!,default.aspx catalog.aspx,Online Catalog,Browse Our Many Great Items!,default.aspx ``` `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`提供的所有示例实现属性和方法。The `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` provides example implementations of all the properties and methods. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/CS/simpletextsitemapprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/VB/simpletextsitemapprovider.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类类必须实现抽象方法。Classes that derive from the class must implement the abstract method. 提供的 URL 可以是虚拟或绝对 URL。The URL provided can be a virtual or absolute URL. 它还可能是使用应用程序相关的语法，如 URL `~/apprelativedirectory`。It might also be a URL that uses application-relative syntax, such as `~/apprelativedirectory`. 确保任何实现方法分析并正确地处理应用程序相关的语法。Ensure that any implementation of the method parse and handle application-relative syntax properly. 类，该类是 ASP.NET 的默认站点映射提供程序，使用的 URL作为类所维护的各种集合中键的对象。The class, which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the URL of a object as a key in the various collections that the classes maintain. 因此，如果提供一个 URL，它必须是唯一的站点地图提供程序作用域内。Therefore, if a provides a URL, it must be unique within the scope of the site map provider. 如果不提供任何 URL，则生成的唯一标识符来标识。If no URL is provided, a unique identifier is generated to identify the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现方法的类中实现了抽象类。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method in a class that implements the abstract class. `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`使用一个帮助器方法，名为`FindUrl`，以获取从当前显示页的 URL对象。The `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` uses a helper method, named `FindUrl`, to get the URL of the currently displayed page from the object. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不会实际生成站点地图，它仅准备状态对象执行此操作。The method does not actually build a site map, it only prepares the state of the object to do so. 默认实现初始化站点导航配置的站点映射提供程序的属性。The default implementation initializes the property for the site map provider from the site navigation configuration. 派生的类可以重写方法来初始化任何状态和从持久性存储区加载站点地图数据所需的资源。Classes that derive from the can override the method to initialize any state and resources that are required to load site map data from persistent storage. 例如，如果派生的类使用文件来存储站点地图数据，任何文件初始化可以执行在方法。For example, if your derived class is using files to store site map data, any file initialization can be performed in the method. 如果派生的类使用某些其他类型的数据存储，如关系数据库中，可能会执行初始化数据库连接。If the derived class uses some other type of data store, such as a relational database, initializing a database connection might be performed. 其他属性，如文件的名称或连接字符串，由 ASP.NET 配置系统读取，并将其传递给方法替换其参数。Additional attributes, such as file names or connection strings, are read by the ASP.NET configuration system and passed to the method with its parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以准备 Microsoft Access 数据库连接。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to prepare a Microsoft Access database connection. 连接字符串传入的对象参数的方法。The connection string for the object is passed in the parameter of the method. 在这种情况下，由 Web.config 文件中的特定于提供程序的部分提供的连接字符串。In this case, the connection string is provided by the provider-specific section in the Web.config file. 在这里，`accessSiteMapConnectionString`包含承载站点地图数据的 Microsoft Access 数据库的连接字符串。Here, `accessSiteMapConnectionString` contains a connection string to a Microsoft Access database that hosts the site map data. ``` ``` 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CPP/accesssitemapprovider.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CS/accesssitemapprovider.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/VB/accesssitemapprovider.vb#2)]

para.span: 重写时方法在派生类中，请确保为第一次调用之前执行您自己的初始化基类的方法。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to first call the method for the base class before performing your own initializations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现的所有类类可以支持站点地图提供程序层次结构的概念。All classes that implement the class can support the concept of a site map provider hierarchy. 任何提供程序之间的层次结构关系的作用域之外维护由提供程序本身的集合。Any hierarchical relationships between providers are maintained outside the scope of a collection by the providers themselves. 功能性的提供程序层次结构的示例，请参阅。For an example of a functional provider hierarchy, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现属性的类中实现了抽象类。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the property in a class that implements the abstract class. `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`使用简单的逻辑来确定当前提供程序是否是提供程序层次结构的一部分。The `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` uses simple logic to determine whether the current provider is part of a provider hierarchy. 如果提供程序层次结构的一部分，它使用父提供程序为其自身的属性。If the provider is part of a hierarchy, it uses the property for the parent provider as its own. 如果提供程序不是层次结构的一部分，提供程序是其自己的根提供程序。If the provider is not part of a hierarchy, the provider is its own root provider. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以创建而无需通过订阅来实现自定义的站点地图提供程序当前请求页的表示形式事件。You can create a representation of the currently requested page without implementing a custom site map provider by subscribing to the event. 订阅者将附加对象以接收通知时属性调用，并且可以返回一个自定义而不是一个返回的默认对象属性。Subscribers attach a object to receive notification when the property is called and can return a custom object instead of the default one that is returned by the property. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
